message: Let's split it 4:1, it's a fair start!
You're not going to get away with a fair split that easily!
Let's not get too aggressive, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're getting desperate, Alice. Time to make a serious offer
You're getting closer, Bob, but I'm not done yet!
You're running out of time, Alice. Take it or leave it
I'm not backing down, Bob. Let's make a deal!
